alert.note: Alert for Chelan; Okanogan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 26 at 6:29PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of North Central Washington, including the following counties, Chelan and Okanogan. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered slow moving thunderstorms will continue over Chelan and western portions of Okanogan counties through early this evening. Storms will be capable of producing heavy rain quickly over steep terrain. Runoff will be capable of producing rapid rises on creeks as well as producing rock and mud slides. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
